name: Olaf SUTTON, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Sutton v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Olaf SUTTON, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of November, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief, the Application for an Immediate Hearing, the Application for Stay, and the Application for Appointment of Counsel are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation not permitted). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1055
Olaf SUTTON, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 151 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 9, 2012.
